title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.4 - Procedures for securing approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.4 - Procedures for securing approval

State Regulations
(a) Two samples of safety belts, including
attachment settings, labeled package or container and instructions for
installing, shall be shipped, postage prepaid, to the Commissioner of Motor

Vehicles, Empire State Plaza, Albany, N.Y. 12228, together with a certification
and report of testing results from any unbiased laboratory acceptable to the
commissioner, that the assembled safety belt meets with the statutory
requirements of section
383
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law and this Part. (b) In lieu of approval under subdivision (a)
of this section, approval shall be deemed to be granted upon the receipt by the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles of a certificate of equipment approval issued by
the American Association of Motor Vehicles Administrators to the Commissioner
of Motor Vehicles, Bureau of Automotive Safety Standards, Empire State Plaza, Albany, N.Y. 12228. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
49.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
